channel.title: [317] 3c-Nation Development Team - Need Coders/Web/Staff [PI] [317]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][url=http://www.3c-nation.com]http://www.3c-nation.com[/url] [/size][i]*URL allowed under Taharok's discretion.[/i][/center] [center][i]*Now Accepting Beta Testers [/i] (Server:ONLINE)[/center]
[center][img]http://3c-nation.com/play/mop.png[/img][/center] [center][size=36pt]Update: WE REALLY NEED DEVELOPERS AS OF 12/13/11. [/size] [size=26pt]Update: Pictures are outdated. The server is now loading a 562 gameframe and 602 gfx. [/size] [/center]
Hello, I am currently developing a 317 PI Based server. I have become very overwhelmed taking care of everything myself. Now that I have obtained a server to host on, and a website to host a forum and webclient, I am searching for development and maintenance staff to go public. I have ran multiple servers in the past, from which I have learned a lot from. I definitely learned that I need to be patient and create a solid, efficient staff. In the past I have dealt too much with dysfunctional or immature staff. Please keep this in mind before applying. I am long tired of young kids joining my staff and doing an inadequate job, and then proceeding to DDoS, spam, report my server, or anything possible to troll me after I kick them.
Requirements for Java Developers :
-Mature -Experience with Java -Experience coding PI
Requirements for Web Developers
-Mature -Experience with MySQL -Intermediate with php
Requirements for Moderators:
-Mature -Social Skills -Great communication skills -Common Sense -Proper Grammar
[u]Current Staff[/u]
[b]Moderators:[/b] -OFWGKTA - - - -
[b]Administrators:[/b] -Gypsy -Onelife
[b]JavaDev:[/b] -Gypsy -
[b]WebDev:[/b] - -
[b]Videographers:[/b] - -
[b]Beta Testers:[/b] - - -
Server Features:
100% working Fun Pk Zone Amazing combat Fully functional clan chat Donator Status + Area with Shops PK Points + Pk Shop Lootshare Custom Coded, 100% God Wars Amazing npc drop system Fight Pits Pest Control Barrows Fight Caves All Skills Work Potions 100% Food 100% 100% Potion dose mixing Base for skill menus Piety + chivalry Perfect prayer draining Custom infinity/mage book minigame Working obelisks Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp Quick Chat
Login Screen: [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/24wt74y.png[/img]
Here is a preview of PVP: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/o02xxz.jpg[/img]
[b]Some pictures of godwars[/b]:
Teleport to interface to GWD: [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/5599/gwdinterface.jpg[/img] In the waiting room for bandos: [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/4078/gwdwaitingroom.jpg[/img] Fighting inside GWD: [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3286/gwdbanod1.jpg[/img] [img]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/5369/gwadbandos2.jpg[/img]
Fighting Saradomin GWD [img]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/2654/gwdsara1.jpg[/img] Finishing up Saradomin GWD [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/7245/gwdsarawaitingroom.jpg[/img]
Armadyl GWD [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/5008/gwdarmadyl1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2621m3p.jpg[/img]
Beta testers please post MSN credentials.
Application Process:
[b]Position:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Age:[/b] [b]Notes:[/b] [b]Ventrilo?[/b]
After filling this out, contact me on msn: gypsy.mm@live.com

item.title: [317] 3c-Nation Development Team - Need Coders/Web/Staff [PI] [317]
item.dc:creator: @Gypsy Gypsy
item.description:
@Gypsy wrote:

[quote=“hrach123, post:31, topic:422749”]Position: WebDev + Webclient Jar and Signer
Experience: More than 2 years.
Age: 14
Notes: I currently own a RSPS and I have been hosting it for over a year now.
If you want proof please pm me as I do not want to break the rule : Advertising.
I live in the UK. I am also making my own Server Status Page at the moment.
My grammar is also very good. If you choose my as the position aforementioned then I will make you proud.
Ventrilo: I have heard of Ventrilo but I unfortuneatly don’t have it.

Extra notes: I can also code AJAX, JAVA, PHP, MySQL, HTML, SHTML and I can install SSL certificates.
Thanks for reading this.

[Color=red] -Hrach[/color][/quote]

TheAmmoBandit,
I have not received any contact information from you.

Hrach,
Please contact me on MSN.

Read full topic

Age:16

Notes: I have been been developing an application (RSPS Client Launcher) you can check it out in the Client Hacking section on the forums. I’ve also been mod, admin adn community manager on various servers.
